title: CTRL0000060754 - Transcribed Interview of Lawrence Stackhouse, (March 22, 2022)

data.text: JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL,
The interview in the above matter was held via Webex, commencing at 2:04 p.m.
For the SELECT COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE
THE JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL:
Let's go on the record at 2:03 p.m.
